messages.message:
This is a dumb question! But for Nationwide we likely need this fix here:
https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-3258
to be ported to 25.24 and 25.26. It's scheduled for 25.28 but is required earlier
could someone advise me how to do this?
Checkout a new branch from the existing release branch, cherry pick the relevant commits (git cherry-pick <commit id>) and create a PR!
Normally you can also just add the labels to the PR but if you've already merged then you have to manually do it
https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/x/AYD4aw u can also run `/trop run backport` after adding the right labels
idk if it makes sense to backport to 25.24 since 25.26 is going to be GA to single tenant envs to next week? not sure how the push to prod schedule works for versions that are already on prod
yep only 25.26 makes senseâ€¦ok ill take a look at this. Thanks team!
